plot outline: This movie is about the life of a middle class, widowed father, Shrikant that takes an unexpected turn when his seven year old Son, Mandar collapses and is referred to Jansanjeevani Hospital for a detailed diagnosis. Things take a turn when Mandar starts talking to a mysterious nurse which he claims to be staying in the abandoned part of the hospital.
title: Bali
plot: This movie is about the life of a middle class, widowed father, Shrikant that takes an unexpected turn when his seven year old Son, Mandar collapses and is referred to Jansanjeevani Hospital for a detailed diagnosis. Things take a turn when Mandar starts talking to a mysterious nurse which he claims to be staying in the abandoned part of the hospital.

It's nice to see it as a suspense movie and not a horror one. There are a lot of horror-like scenes and they are definitely scary, the sound combination, the filming, the lighting scheme etc are very nice. Everyone has done great acting. Such and complete horror is still expected in Marathi,::evikramsiha
